WRITING.TEXT: that's good to hear. and thank you, it means a lot!
thank you so much for sharing this. it's exactly what i was hoping for when i posted it. i hope you're doing well yourself. :]

i know last semester, she was unbelievably stressed out and spent hours upon hours at the gym per day. it would take a trail of french fries to even get me to step foot into a gym, so i have no idea how she does. the thing is, our mutual friend is closer with her than i am, yet we have no idea what it is she's dealing with that is causing this reaction. :[
i hear you. my kryptonite is mcdonald's french fries.
